122    /// 服务器启动
123    public void startServer() throws IOException{
124        sml.info("[服务器初始化] 开始初始化HTTP服务器...");
125
126        initializeChatLog();
127        
128        serverHttp = HttpServer.create(new InetSocketAddress(port), 0);
129
130        sml.info("[路由注册] 注册HTTP路由处理器...");
131        serverHttp.createContext("/connect", new ConnectHandler());
132        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/connect' 路由 - 处理客户端连接请求");
133        serverHttp.createContext("/message", new MessageHandler());
134        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/message' 路由 - 处理客户端消息发送");
135        serverHttp.createContext("/disconnect", new DisconnectHandler());
136        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/disconnect' 路由 - 处理客户端断开连接");
137        serverHttp.createContext("/broadcast", new BroadcastHandler());
138        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/broadcast' 路由 - 处理广播消息请求");
139
140        serverHttp.start();
141        sml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
142        sml.info("[服务器启动成功] IRC服务器已成功启动");
143        sml.info("[监听信息] 服务器正在监听 IPv" + ipProtocol + ":" + port);
144        sml.info("[实例信息] 服务器实例名称: " + serverInstanceName);
145        sml.info("[实例信息] 服务器描述: " + serverDescription);
146        sml.info("");
147        sml.info("[核心信息]正在使用的CoffeeIRC核心的软件信息:");
148        sml.info("        版本号: " + SwInfo.version);
149        sml.info("        开发状态: " + SwInfo.softwareStatus);
150        sml.info("        版本代号: " + SwInfo.VerCodename);
151        sml.info("        支持协议: " + SwInfo.connection);
152        sml.info("");
153        sml.info("当前运行本核心的发行版: " + DistributionName);
154        sml.info("");
155        sml.info("如果遇到核心问题，请提交至: https://github.com/deplayeris/coffeeirc/issues");
156        sml.info("如在使用基于本核心的发行版(如无忧聊)时出现问题");
157        sml.info("请先检查是否为核心故障(通过查看核心日志)，若非核心问题请联系发行版作者");
158        sml.info("");
159        sml.info("核心问题提交步骤:");
160        sml.info("1. 在GitHub上创建新的Issue");
161        sml.info("2. 详细准确地描述遇到的问题");
162        sml.info("3. 附上出现问题时的核心日志文件");
163        sml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
164        sml.info("[服务器就绪] 服务器已完全就绪，正在等待客户端连接...");
165    };

167    // 常规的记录客户端信息的类，你也可以参考一下，这样管理真的很方便
168    class ClientInfo {
169        private String clientId;
170        private String username;
171        private String ipAddress;
172        private LocalDateTime connectTime;
173        private LocalDateTime lastActivityTime;
174
175        public ClientInfo(String clientId, String username, String ipAddress) {
176            this.clientId = clientId;
177            this.username = username;
178            this.ipAddress = ipAddress;
179            this.connectTime = LocalDateTime.now();
180            this.lastActivityTime = LocalDateTime.now();
181        }
182
183        public String getClientId() { return clientId; }
184        public String getUsername() { return username; }
185        public String getIpAddress() { return ipAddress; }
186        public LocalDateTime getConnectTime() { return connectTime; }
187        public LocalDateTime getLastActivityTime() { return lastActivityTime; }
188        public void updateActivityTime() { this.lastActivityTime = LocalDateTime.now(); }
189
190        public String getFormattedConnectTime() {
191            return connectTime.format(timeFormatter);
192        }
193
194        public String getFormattedLastActivityTime() {
195            return lastActivityTime.format(timeFormatter);
196        }
197    }
198
199    /// 连接处理器类
200    class ConnectHandler implements HttpHandler {
201        /// 处理客户端连接请求
202        /// @param exchange 请求对象
203        @Override
204        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
205            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
206                try {
207                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
208
209                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
210                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
211                    inputStream.close();
212
213                    String username = "未知用户";
214                    if (requestBody.contains("\"username\":\"")) {
215                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"username\":\"") + 12;
216                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
217                        if (end > start) {
218                            username = requestBody.substring(start, end);
219                        }
220                    }
221
222                    String clientId = "client_" + (++clientIdCounter);
223
224                    ClientInfo clientInfo = new ClientInfo(clientId, username, clientIp);
225                    connectedClients.put(clientId, clientInfo);
226
227                    sml.info("[连接请求处理] 处理来自用户 '" + username + "' 的连接请求");
228                    sml.info("[客户端识别] 分配客户端ID: " + clientId);
229                    sml.info("[网络信息] 客户端IP地址: " + clientIp);
230                    sml.info("[连接建立] 用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 成功连接到服务器");
231                    sml.info("[时间戳记] 连接建立时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime());
232                    sml.info("[统计信息] 当前在线用户总数: " + connectedClients.size());
233                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"连接成功\",\"clientId\":\"" + clientId + "\"}";
234                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
235                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
236                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
237                    os.write(response.getBytes());
238                    os.close();
239                    sml.info("[响应完成] 已向用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 发送连接并且成功确认");
240
241                } catch (Exception e) {
242                    sml.error("[连接错误] 处理客户端连接请求时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
243                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"连接失败\"}";
244                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
245                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
246                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
247                    os.write(response.getBytes());
248                    os.close();
249                }
250            } else {
251                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的连接请求");
252                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
253                exchange.close();
254            }
255        }
256    }
257
258    /// 消息处理器类
259    class MessageHandler implements HttpHandler {
260        @Override
261        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
262            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
263                try {
264                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
265
266                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
267                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
268                    inputStream.close();
269
270                    String message = "无内容";
271                    String clientId = "unknown";
272                    String username = "未知用户";
273
274                    if (requestBody.contains("\"message\":\"")) {
275                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"message\":\"") + 11;
276                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
277                        if (end > start) {
278                            message = requestBody.substring(start, end);
279                        }
280                    }
281
282                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
283                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
284                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
285                        if (end > start) {
286                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
287                        }
288                    }
289
290                    ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
291                    if (clientInfo != null) {
292                        username = clientInfo.getUsername();
293                        clientInfo.updateActivityTime();
294                    }
295
296                    String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(timeFormatter);
297                    sml.info("[消息处理] 处理来自客户端的消息请求");
298                    sml.info("[时间标记] 消息接收时间: " + timestamp);
299                    sml.info("[用户验证] 已验证用户身份: '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ")");
300                    sml.info("[内容审查] 接收到的消息内容: " + message);
301                    sml.info("[会话更新] 已更新用户 '" + username + "' 的最后活动时间");
302
303                    logChatMessage(username, message);
304
305                    if (message.startsWith("/")) {
306                        sml.info("[命令识别] 检测到特殊命令输入: " + message);
307                        if (message.equals("/users")) {
308                            sml.info("[用户查询] 用户 '" + username + "' 请求查看在线用户列表");
309                            sml.info("[统计查询] 当前在线用户总数: " + connectedClients.size());
310                            sml.info("[列表详情] 详细在线用户信息:");
311                            for (ClientInfo info : connectedClients.values()) {
312                                sml.info("[用户信息] 用户名: '" + info.getUsername() + "', 客户端ID: " + info.getClientId() + ", 连接时间: " + info.getFormattedConnectTime() + ", 最后活动: " + info.getFormattedLastActivityTime());
313                            }
314                        } else if (message.equals("/help")) {
315                            sml.info("[帮助请求] 用户 '" + username + "' 请求帮助文档");
316                        } else {
317                            sml.info("[未知命令] 用户 '" + username + "' 输入了未识别的命令: " + message);
318                        }
319                    } else {
320                    }
321
322                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"消息接收成功\",\"timestamp\":\"" + timestamp + "\"}";
323                    sml.info("[响应构造] 构造消息确认响应");
324                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
325                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
326                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
327                    os.write(response.getBytes());
328                    os.close();
329
330                    sml.info("[响应完成] 已向用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 发送消息接收确认");
331                    sml.info("[处理结束] 消息处理流程已完成");
332
333                } catch (Exception e) {
334                    sml.error("[消息错误] 处理客户端消息时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
335                    e.printStackTrace();
336                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"消息处理失败\"}";
337                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
338                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
339                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
340                    os.write(response.getBytes());
341                    os.close();
342                }
343            } else {
344                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的消息请求");
345                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
346                exchange.close();
347            }
348        }
349    }

351    /// 断开连接处理器类
352    class DisconnectHandler implements HttpHandler {
353        @Override
354        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
355            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
356                try {
357
358                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
359
360                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
361                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
362                    inputStream.close();
363
364                    String clientId = "unknown";
365                    String username = "未知用户";
366
367                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
368                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
369                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
370                        if (end > start) {
371                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
372                        }
373                    }
374                    ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
375                    if (clientInfo != null) {
376                        username = clientInfo.getUsername();
377
378                        long onlineSeconds = java.time.Duration.between(clientInfo.getConnectTime(), LocalDateTime.now()).getSeconds();
379                        long hours = onlineSeconds / 3600;
380                        long minutes = (onlineSeconds % 3600) / 60;
381                        long seconds = onlineSeconds % 60;
382                        String onlineDuration = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds);
383
384                        sml.info("[断开请求] 处理用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 的断开连接请求");
385                        sml.info("[会话信息] 用户连接建立时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime());
386                        sml.info("[会话时长] 用户总在线时长: " + onlineDuration);
387                        sml.info("[最后活动] 用户最后活跃时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedLastActivityTime());
388                        connectedClients.remove(clientId);
389                        sml.info("[会话终止] 已从活跃用户列表中移除用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ")");
390                        sml.info("[状态更新] 断开后当前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
391                    } else {
392                        sml.warn("[断开异常] 检测到断开请求中的客户端ID不存在 尝试断开不存在的客户端连接");
393                        sml.info("[无效ID] 客户端ID: " + clientId);
394                        sml.info("//当前在线用户数仍为"+connectedClients.size() +"，可能是重复断开请求或客户端状态不一致");
395                    }
396
397                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"已断开连接\"}";
398                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
399                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
400                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
401                    os.write(response.getBytes());
402                    os.close();
403
404                    sml.info("[响应发送] 已确认用户 '" + username + "' 断开连接");
405
406                } catch (Exception e) {
407                    sml.error("[断开异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
408                    sml.error("[详细错误] 堆栈跟踪:", e);
409                    sml.info("[恢复措施] 正在构造错误响应以通知客户端");
410                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"断开连接失败\"}";
411                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
412                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
413                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
414                    os.write(response.getBytes());
415                    os.close();
416                    sml.info("[响应发送] 已向客户端发送断开失败的错误响应");
417                }
418            } else {
419                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的断开请求");
420                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
421                exchange.close();
422            }
423        }
424    }

426    /// 广播处理器类
427    class BroadcastHandler implements HttpHandler {
428        @Override
429        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
430            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
431                try {
432                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
433                        
434                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
435                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
436                    inputStream.close();
437                        
438                    String message = "无内容";
439                    String sender = "未知用户";
440                    String clientId = "unknown";
441                        
442                    if (requestBody.contains("\"message\":\"")) {
443                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"message\":\"") + 11;
444                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
445                        if (end > start) {
446                            message = requestBody.substring(start, end);
447                        }
448                    }
449                        
450                    if (requestBody.contains("\"sender\":\"")) {
451                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"sender\":\"") + 10;
452                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
453                        if (end > start) {
454                            sender = requestBody.substring(start, end);
455                        }
456                    }
457                        
458                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
459                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
460                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
461                        if (end > start) {
462                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
463                        }
464                    }
465                        
466                    sml.info("[广播] 收到来自 '" + sender + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 的广播请求, 广播消息: " + message);
467                    broadcastMessage(message);
468                        
469                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"广播消息已处理\"}";
470                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
471                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
472                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
473                    os.write(response.getBytes());
474                    os.close();
475                        
476                } catch (Exception e) {
477                    sml.error("[广播错误] 处理广播请求时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
478                    sml.error("[详细错误] 堆栈跟踪:", e);
479                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"广播处理失败\"}";
480                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
481                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
482                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
483                    os.write(response.getBytes());
484                    os.close();
485                }
486            } else {
487                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的广播请求");
488                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
489                exchange.close();
490            }
491        }
492    }
493
494    /// 停止服务器
495    public void stopServer() throws IOException{
496        sml.info("[服务器关闭] 正在关闭IRC服务器...");
497        sml.info("[关闭统计] 关闭前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
498        closeChatLog();
499        if (!connectedClients.isEmpty()) {
500            sml.info("[强制断开] 以下用户将被强制断开连接:");
501            for (ClientInfo clientInfo : connectedClients.values()) {
502                long onlineSeconds = java.time.Duration.between(clientInfo.getConnectTime(), LocalDateTime.now()).getSeconds();
503                long hours = onlineSeconds / 3600;
504                long minutes = (onlineSeconds % 3600) / 60;
505                long seconds = onlineSeconds % 60;
506                String onlineDuration = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds);
507
508                sml.info("[强制断开] 用户: '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' (ID: " + clientInfo.getClientId() + ")");
509                sml.info("[会话信息] 连接时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime() + ", 在线时长: " + onlineDuration);
510            }
511        }
512
513        connectedClients.clear();
514        clientIdCounter = 0;
515
516        serverHttp.stop(0);
517        sml.info("[服务器关闭] IRC服务器已完全关闭");
518        sml.info("[资源清理] 所有客户端连接已清除，资源已释放");
519    }

532
533    /**记录聊天日志所必须要使用的一个Method*/
534    private void initializeChatLog() {
535        try {
536            File logDir = new File("./ciclog");
537            if (!logDir.exists()) {
538                logDir.mkdirs();
539            }
540
541            currentChatLogDate = LocalDate.now().toString();
542            String logFileName = "./ciclog/chatlog-s-" + currentChatLogDate + ".log";
543            FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(logFileName, true);
544            chatLogWriter = new PrintWriter(fileWriter, true);
545                
546            sml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志系统已初始化，日志文件: " + logFileName);
547                
548        } catch (IOException e) {
549            sml.error("[聊天日志错误] 初始化聊天日志失败: " + e.getMessage());
550        }
551    }
552
553    ///记录聊天消息
554    /// @param username 用户名
555    /// @param message 消息
556    private void logChatMessage(String username, String message) {
557        try {
558            String today = LocalDate.now().toString();
559            if (!today.equals(currentChatLogDate)) {
560                closeChatLog();
561                initializeChatLog();
562            }
563                
564            if (chatLogWriter != null) {
565                String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(chatLogFormatter);
566                String logEntry = timestamp + " [ " + username + " ] " + message;
567                chatLogWriter.println(logEntry);
568                chatLogWriter.flush();
569            }
570        } catch (Exception e) {
571            sml.error("[聊天日志错误] 记录聊天消息失败: " + e.getMessage());
572        }
573    }
574
575    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭聊天日志记录*/
576    private void closeChatLog() {
577        if (chatLogWriter != null) {
578            chatLogWriter.close();
579            chatLogWriter = null;
580            sml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志文件已关闭");
581        }
582    }
583
584    ///向指定客户端发送推送消息
585    /// @param clientId 客户端ID
586    /// @param message 消息
587    private void sendPushMessage(String clientId, String message) throws Exception {
588        ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
589        if (clientInfo == null) {
590            throw new Exception("客户端不存在");
591        }
592        
593        String clientIp = clientInfo.getIpAddress();
594        String pushUrl = "http://" + clientIp + ":10026/push";
595        
596        HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
597                .uri(URI.create(pushUrl))
598                .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(5))
599                .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
600                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(message))
601                .build();
602        
603        HttpClient httpClient = HttpClient.newHttpClient();
604        HttpResponse<String> response = httpClient.send(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
605        
606        if (response.statusCode() != 200) {
607            throw new Exception("推送失败，状态码: " + response.statusCode());
608        }
609    }
610
611    /// 广播消息
612    /// @param message 消息
613    public void broadcastMessage(String message) {
614        sml.info("[广播] 向所有在线用户广播消息: " + message);
615        sml.info("[广播统计] 当前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
616            
617        if (connectedClients.isEmpty()) {
618            sml.warn("[广播警告] 没有在线用户，广播消息未发送");
619            return;
620        }
621
622        String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(timeFormatter);
623        String broadcastMsg = "{\"type\":\"broadcast\",\"message\":\"" + message + "\",\"timestamp\":\"" + timestamp + "\"}";
624            
625        int successCount = 0;
626        int failCount = 0;
627            
628        for (ClientInfo clientInfo : connectedClients.values()) {
629            try {
630                sendPushMessage(clientInfo.getClientId(), broadcastMsg);
631                sml.info("[广播发送] 向用户 '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' (ID: " + clientInfo.getClientId() + ") 发送广播消息");
632                successCount++;
633            } catch (Exception e) {
634                sml.error("[广播失败] 向用户 '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' 发送广播时出错: " + e.getMessage());
635                failCount++;
636            }
637        }
638            
639        sml.info("[广播完成] 广播发送统计 - 成功: " + successCount + "人, 失败: " + failCount + "人");
640    }
